article_node.title: Kronos Worldwide, Inc. Announces Private Offering of an Additional €75 Million of 9.50% Senior Secured Notes Due 2029
article_node.summary: Kronos Worldwide Inc. is raising €75 million through a private placement of 9.50% senior secured notes due 2029, adding to its existing €351 million of similar notes. The proceeds will be used to repay maturing 3.75% notes or draw on a revolving credit facility, with any remaining funds earmarked for general corporate purposes. The offering is limited to qualified institutional buyers under Rule 144A and Regulation S and is subject to market conditions.
